11#ifndef MODULES_VIDEO_CODING_UTILITY_QUALITY_SCALER_H_
12#define MODULES_VIDEO_CODING_UTILITY_QUALITY_SCALER_H_
13
14#include <stddef.h>
15#include <stdint.h>
16
17#include <memory>
18
19#include "absl/types/optional.h"
20#include "api/scoped_refptr.h"
21#include "api/sequence_checker.h"
22#include "api/video_codecs/video_encoder.h"
23#include "rtc_base/experiments/quality_scaling_experiment.h"
24#include "rtc_base/numerics/moving_average.h"
25#include "rtc_base/ref_count.h"
26#include "rtc_base/ref_counted_object.h"
27#include "rtc_base/system/no_unique_address.h"
28#include "rtc_base/task_queue.h"
29
30namespace webrtc {
31
32class QualityScalerQpUsageHandlerCallbackInterface;
33class QualityScalerQpUsageHandlerInterface;
34
35// QualityScaler runs asynchronously and monitors QP values of encoded frames.
36// It holds a reference to a QualityScalerQpUsageHandlerInterface implementation
37// to signal an overuse or underuse of QP (which indicate a desire to scale the
38// video stream down or up).
39class QualityScaler {
40 public:
41 // Construct a QualityScaler with given |thresholds| and |handler|.
42 // This starts the quality scaler periodically checking what the average QP
43 // has been recently.
44 QualityScaler(QualityScalerQpUsageHandlerInterface* handler,
45 VideoEncoder::QpThresholds thresholds);
46 virtual ~QualityScaler();
47 // Should be called each time a frame is dropped at encoding.
48 void ReportDroppedFrameByMediaOpt();
49 void ReportDroppedFrameByEncoder();
50 // Inform the QualityScaler of the last seen QP.
51 void ReportQp(int qp, int64_t time_sent_us);
52
53 void SetQpThresholds(VideoEncoder::QpThresholds thresholds);
54 bool QpFastFilterLow() const;
55
56 // The following members declared protected for testing purposes.
57 protected:
58 QualityScaler(QualityScalerQpUsageHandlerInterface* handler,
59 VideoEncoder::QpThresholds thresholds,
60 int64_t sampling_period_ms);
61
62 private:
63 class QpSmoother;
64 class CheckQpTask;
65 class CheckQpTaskHandlerCallback;
66
67 enum class CheckQpResult {
68 kInsufficientSamples,
69 kNormalQp,
70 kHighQp,
71 kLowQp,
72 };
73
74 // Starts checking for QP in a delayed task. When the resulting CheckQpTask
75 // completes, it will invoke this method again, ensuring that we always
76 // periodically check for QP. See CheckQpTask for more details. We never run
77 // more than one CheckQpTask at a time.
78 void StartNextCheckQpTask();
79
80 CheckQpResult CheckQp() const;
81 void ClearSamples();
82
83 std::unique_ptr<CheckQpTask> pending_qp_task_ RTC_GUARDED_BY(&task_checker_);
84 QualityScalerQpUsageHandlerInterface* const handler_
85 RTC_GUARDED_BY(&task_checker_);
86 RTC_NO_UNIQUE_ADDRESS SequenceChecker task_checker_;
87
88 VideoEncoder::QpThresholds thresholds_ RTC_GUARDED_BY(&task_checker_);
89 const int64_t sampling_period_ms_;
90 bool fast_rampup_ RTC_GUARDED_BY(&task_checker_);
91 rtc::MovingAverage average_qp_ RTC_GUARDED_BY(&task_checker_);
92 rtc::MovingAverage framedrop_percent_media_opt_
93 RTC_GUARDED_BY(&task_checker_);
94 rtc::MovingAverage framedrop_percent_all_ RTC_GUARDED_BY(&task_checker_);
95
96 // Used by QualityScalingExperiment.
97 const bool experiment_enabled_;
98 QualityScalingExperiment::Config config_ RTC_GUARDED_BY(&task_checker_);
99 std::unique_ptr<QpSmoother> qp_smoother_high_ RTC_GUARDED_BY(&task_checker_);
100 std::unique_ptr<QpSmoother> qp_smoother_low_ RTC_GUARDED_BY(&task_checker_);
101
102 const size_t min_frames_needed_;
103 const double initial_scale_factor_;
104 const absl::optional<double> scale_factor_;
105};
106
107// Reacts to QP being too high or too low. For best quality, when QP is high it
108// is desired to decrease the resolution or frame rate of the stream and when QP
109// is low it is desired to increase the resolution or frame rate of the stream.
110// Whether to reconfigure the stream is ultimately up to the handler, which is
111// able to respond asynchronously.
112class QualityScalerQpUsageHandlerInterface {
113 public:
114 virtual ~QualityScalerQpUsageHandlerInterface();
115
116 virtual void OnReportQpUsageHigh() = 0;
117 virtual void OnReportQpUsageLow() = 0;
118};
119
120} // namespace webrtc
121
122#endif // MODULES_VIDEO_CODING_UTILITY_QUALITY_SCALER_H_
